Title: Sanctuary
Actors: Amanda Tapping, Robin Dunne, Christopher Heyerdahl, Ryan Robbins
Plot: Stem cells, gene therapy, transplants, and cloning have changed the definition of "humanity" in the modern world, but the darker side contains monsters that only few are brave enough to face, because the future lies in their hands.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 20 wins & 52 nominations.
